FuncDef: This command specifies a list of one to five SRLG groups in the optical network which the router can request to the UNI-N that the GMPLS LSP path should avoid by signaling it in the XRO of the RSVP path message. Eachgroup-namemust have been defined underconfig>router>if-attribute>srlg-group.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the SRLG. Values-32 characters maximum text string.
